moves.1. Nh3: So we are off again in this weird opening
moves.1... b5: well that is daring, think I'll develop in the centre
moves.2. e4 a6: I have no idea what black is playing at here
moves.3. d4 Bb7: Despite my horrible knight I am happy with my position, and am going to develop slowly
moves.4. Bd3 e6 5. O-O Nf6 6. e5: Black has the diagonal, but the black squared bishop is poor at the moment
moves.9. a3 cxd4 10. cxd4 Nc6 11. Be3: Encouraging black to take the bishop as it opens up the f file and creates pressure on f7
moves.12... Be7 13. Qg4 g5 14. Nc3 Nxe3 15. fx: Although it doesn't look pretty white has options and if black castles long a rook on c1 will cause problems, although white still has to be wary of the b7 bishop
moves.18... O-O-O 19. Nxf7 Rhg8 20. Nxd8 Nxd8: Black threatens the g2 square but white has an answer
moves.22... Qg7 23. Bxb7: White wants to simplify as mush as possible
moves.23... Nxb7: R-c2 may have been better here
